name: DERI
description:
Deri, your option, your future!

Deri Protocol is the DeFi way to trade derivatives: to hedge, to speculate, to arbitrage, all on chain. With Deri Protocol, trades are executed under AMM paradigm and positions are tokenized as NFTs, highly composable with other DeFi projects. Deri Protocol supports three major derivative types: Perpetual futures, Everlasting Options and Power Perpetuals. Having provided an effective on-chain mechanism to trade derivatives, Deri Protocol has become one of the most important blocks of the Web3 infrastructure.
